column83: Home sphere of Critical Role’s setting
Home sphere of Magic: The Gathering D&D settings
Home sphere of the Grim Hollow setting.  Grimdark, Gothic Horror.
Home sphere of the Primeval Thule setting. Sword-and-sandals, low magic, prehistoric/bronze age barbarians.

Home sphere of the Orizon. Inspired by the video game Skies of Arcadia, the historic age of sail and swashbuckling epics set within them, with a dash of Wheel of Time and Magic the Gathering's Zendikar setting.
Home sphere of the Warhammer Fantasy setting.
Home of the Space Clowns, as described in Boo’s Astral Menagerie. Expanded by mixmastermind.
An updated version of the Ebberron sphere, to be more inline with Keith Baker’s descriptions of the setting.
